website_summaries.verdict: Floating, stacking, nesting boats for lots of imaginative play in the tub.
pros: Parents love the simplicity of these boats since the design will easily adapt to kids' play as they grow
Babies can scoop, stack, and float the boats, learning about buoyancy as they play
Holes let water "rain" through to entertain babies
Parents especially appreciate that the boats are easy to keep clean since there are no hidden places for mold to grow
They are sturdy and great for babies of all ages
cons: The boats have to be stacked in a certain order by size, so small babies won't be able to do it by themselves at first

customer_reviews.title: Not for impatient kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 17 month when I was hunting for mold-free bath toys. They dry quickly and fully so they hit the mark there. I quickly realized that they have to be stacked in certain order when led to my daughter hitting them together and getting upset (bath time is right before bed when patience is at an all-time low). I ended up giving her only two at a time that fit together and that has helped. I’m hoping as she gets older and plays with them more she will have a little better with them.
customer_reviews.author: Smcclure88

customer_reviews.title: Great mold-free bath toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after discovering mold on a few of my daughter's bath toys. I did not always take the toys out of the bath and they eventually all grew very harmful mold spores. These boats are so easy to clean and have nowhere to keep the water after the bath is done. The holes in the middle make them easy to quickly dump and are great fun for the kids. My daughter loves using them as submarines, water transport, and speed boats. So many fun games to play with them! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fun and easy for brothers to share!
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were cheaper, but I'd probably still buy them again if the kiddos somehow trashed the ones we have. The boats are great for scooping, pouring, or sifting, just as advertised. They're also all slightly different dimensions to make the stacking easier, so they only stack in order. That said, although they were a gift for my youngest all three boys (5, 7, 10) enjoy blowing them around, splashing them, making waves, and trying them all to see which ones they like best. These things are going to be a stable for bath time and the wading pool in our backyard for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: OK but hard to stack
customer_reviews.text: To clean just dump some bleach in the tub after baby is in bed. Certainly sturdy. Hard to figure out how to stack, which frustrated my 3 yr old. Boats are too close in size and the ends are not different enough. But he likes them for pouring and dripping water through the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia S. Moe

customer_reviews.title: Bath boats!
customer_reviews.text: Great bath boats. Got my 10 month old daughter theses for Christmas and she loves playing with them. They are also great to help wash/rinse her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best Bath Boats
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of 4 we have had our share of random bath toys over the years. These are the beat boats I have seen. I ordered the navy set and the colors are perfect. The sleek clean design is perfect. The float great are so much easier to stack than other reviewers seem to let on. I bought these to try to entice my Autistic toddler to want to bathe without a fight and they did the trick. Using them as a rinse cup has made washing his hair so much easier. Plus I feel like these are less likely to collect mold and will be easier to clean with the simple design. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christianne Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for bat or pool
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old loves these boats!! They stack great, they float even when full of water, he loves that he can fill them with water and dump the water out. The holes in the top work well when he turns them over to fill them up with water. These have become one of his favorite bath toys. We have also used these in the pool and they work great because they never sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: We love these because no mold grows on them! There is no place for water to be trapped, super easy to clean and my boys love playing with them! This is my second set of them, to have one set for traveling in one to stay home! Endless amount of fun. I have a 3 year old and a 18 month old both have payed with these since 3 months old. It's a great baby shower gift, affordable and a kid's favorite for years!
customer_reviews.author: Tangible

customer_reviews.title: They float
customer_reviews.text: They're boats and they float. They also stack up nice. If you're OCD like me, this is a bonus. I like to keep them on the corner of the tub and the moment we get in the bathroom he guns it for these. Can't compare them to other boats. We only have these floating boats but they're doing the job just fine. Also, you can turn them upside down and stream water like rain, kids love that stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Marian T Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun little ships
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 packs of these for the grandkids . They are simple. There is enough room to place small animals and people in the boats but also you can flip them over. The smoke stacks ( pretend) have various small holes cut into them so one can make showers. Sometimes simple is the best.
customer_reviews.author: nygardener

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these in the bathtub. He likes to play pretend boats with them. He also likes to make it "rain" over himself. With soapy water, I'm not complaining. He loves his baths with the toys. For 10 minutes a day I have the cleanest 2 year old around.
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: Well loved toy
customer_reviews.text: Great bath tub toy. In addition, we have a splash park nearby which includes a small, shallow wading stream. This set of little boats was a huge hit. This summer my young grandchildren spent more time playing with the little boats in the stream than anywhere else in the splash park.
customer_reviews.author: LeonaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great water toys!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these little stacking boats! They were a huge hit at bath time (they hold a good amount of water for scooping and dumping and float well, even stacked.) And my toddler loves to carry them around the house, stacking and unstacking them. I, personally, love that there's no where for water to be trapped and get all nasty like bath squirters, etc can with use. Wish I had found them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: monkeysohana

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves playing with these.
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my granddaughter to play with when she is taking a bath. She just Love these so much that now that it is summer she take them in the pool to play with. They are so easy to keep clean and really sturdy. They will last her a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgirl6

customer_reviews.title: Must have bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great bath time toy, I love that it’s easy to clean that was a major deciding factor when purchasing these boats. The vibrant colors keep our kiddo entertained. I also love that we can use them to pour bath water over our little one to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: JJR

customer_reviews.title: Space saving and mold free
customer_reviews.text: I love that these stack and don’t take up a ton of space in the bath toy bin. I also like that they don’t hold water and get all icky mold inside like other bath toys. We plan on bringing them to the pool with us this summer!!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Arce

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fleet for our tub
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a simple toy perfect for bath time. These don't collect water in any hidden pockets, which means no growing of mold/mildew! And they stack, which means the tiny bathroom has less of a clutter problem! The price is perfect, and these have entertained both of my younger boys, making bath time a lot more enjoyable for all. These boats are a boon to our bath time!
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cute, and clean bath toys
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bath toys! There are no places for mold to grow! They dry out nicely in between baths. I love that they stack and don’t take up much space. The 1 and 4 yr old love them!
customer_reviews.author: Greg and Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to Stack
customer_reviews.text: These are great bath toys because there's nowhere for water to hide or mold to grow. But something I didn't realize when I ordered them is that they can only stack in a specific order. My 15-month-old can't grasp this concept yet, so it frustrates him that the boats can't nest together unless I help him. Still a great bath toy that he enjoys, but I wish the "bridges" of the boats were the same tapered size so they could be restacked in any order.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Fun little stacking boats
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. They float, stack, hold and dump water, and can hold some of his small toys inside. Easy to clean. Easy to stack so they don’t take up much space on the side of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Beaupre

customer_reviews.title: Great stacking boats!
customer_reviews.text: These keep our baby entertained in the bath tub for a while and keeps him busy so he doesn't keep standing up and trying to crawl out. Easy to wipe clean, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great simple bath toy. Not easy for a baby or young toddler to stack as they have to be in the right order which is a difficult task for them. Overall great for scooping and dumping!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and love that they don’t get moldy like other bath toys. However they are a bit of a pain to stack and store. You have to go in order and it’s difficult to see which is smaller by just glancing. We just throw them in the water toy bin.
customer_reviews.author: yogagirl13

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fun
customer_reviews.text: A simple bath toy, but sometimes those are the best kind. Easy to dry/clean, so no worries about mold growing anywhere. And even though it's pretty basic (boat, cup, sprinkler) my 3 year old still loves it
customer_reviews.author: Morgan H

customer_reviews.title: I like. My daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: I like. My daughter loves. She's had fun playing with these boats since she was 3 months. Is 6 months now. Loves chewing on them. Only issue I have is that they're boats which mean they fill up with water which means when she picks one up to put in her mouth she takes down a mouthful of water sometimes. But she has a blast with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bath toy EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these boats. I got them for my daughter's bath time but she also uses them at the pool. She only wants to play with these, now. Their colors are so beautiful, and there are many ways you can play with them. I also love that they can't get water stuck in them and so no risk of mold developing. I highly, highly recommend buying these, and plan on getting more as gifts for my mom friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amandine

customer_reviews.title: a family favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these adorable boats for my 18-month-old. She loves to stack them and fill them with water so they sink. She is now 26 months and requests them at every bath time. The hard plastic is easy to clean and sanitize. They stack together so they do not take up much space like some other bath toys. And the bright colors are fun for learning!
customer_reviews.author: Tesa May

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little stacking boats that take up minimal space and have draining holes so there are no hiding spaces for mold!
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy to clean bath toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great bath toy, useful for helping rinse during bath. We've had them for over two years and they're still a part of every bath.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Madon

customer_reviews.title: Fun for multiple ages
customer_reviews.text: These are a favorite for both my 3 year old and my 6 month old. They are easy to clean - no hidden parts that collect mold! You can sink them, float. And pour water out like a tiny shower. Happy with my decision to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Moore

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: like everything about these cute stackable boats: size, color, shape and material. definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Best bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: These are my son’s favorite bath toy. He dearly loves these little boats. He also plays with them out of the bath as well. We’ve had them for two years and they still look new after daily use. He can scoop, stack, pour, and learn colors. I love that they are simple and easy to clean. Best bath toys!
customer_reviews.author: Kjh333

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Great bath toys, easy to clean and wont grow mold like the squirt toys! 9 month old daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lieske

customer_reviews.title: Stacking fun in the tub
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my little one, and he loves them. He stacks them up and enjoys playing with them. Only wish that they were in primary colors.
customer_reviews.author: Frida

customer_reviews.title: Super simple, super fun
customer_reviews.text: You can't get any simpler than these stackable boats. My toddler loves them! We keep 2 in the bath, and have 3 for our pool. It's her favorite thing to play with in the water!
customer_reviews.author: V. Petrushun

customer_reviews.title: great little set of bath toys
customer_reviews.text: easy to clean, colorful, - my son loves these. They float, but also have seeve tops so can be used to spoute water. Good toys!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Teperman

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy and helper
customer_reviews.text: New parents love them-great colors,sturdy,and can be used to help rinse baby's hair. Will be fun for play as the baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: maryanne

customer_reviews.title: Great mold-free bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Great value and it’s nice to find bath toys that can’t hide mold. Beautiful colors and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen

customer_reviews.title: Love Boon products. Amazing deal, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bath toys. Dishwasher safe, fun to play with, and well made. We love Boon products, and these cute little boaties did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun & easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous pool/bath toys that have no little books and cranny’s that you can’t clean. The inside of the smallest one I could just barely get a sponge into but it was enough!
customer_reviews.author: hagens

customer_reviews.title: Good boats
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to keep clean and my son loves them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Imaginative
customer_reviews.text: We have had these boats for over two years and my son loves them. Very well made. So much you can do with them. They are big enough to carry some other small toys, and with the added benefit of the sifters; lots of ways to play.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: simple, fun
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 2 year old granddaughter for Valentines Day. She enjoyed playing with them in the bathtub. They will also be great for the kiddie pool this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great Bath Toys!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two daughters to play with in the bath. The love that they are boats, hold water for pouring, and if you flip the boats over and fill it with water - the middle is perforated so it makes a shower stream of water. I use them for hair rinse cups and they stack so storage is easy. They are plastic also so I can run them through the dishwasher periodically if I think they need to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Kutach

customer_reviews.title: Love These Stacking Boats
customer_reviews.text: Love these bath toys! The boats stack very neatly and don't take up a little space. I also love that there's not really any hidden places for mold to hide in. They are very easy to clean! I stuck them in the dishwasher on the top shelf and they came out looking brand new! My son also loves playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bath time 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: My twins love these ! Perfect for bath time and my boys play with them the whole time and even take them after there bath.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean. No mold.
customer_reviews.text: Love these they are so easy to clean and you don’t have to worry about mold and my kid loves them.
customer_reviews.author: YourHandsUntied

customer_reviews.title: 14 month old loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I bought these because I wanted my son to have something to play with that wouldn't get moldy. Thought they might be a little boring but my 14 month old actually loves them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: drew fassler

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2.5 years old and loves these bath boats. They are colorful, easy to clean, and put away after bath time. My daughter has found so many creative uses for these boats, including using them to dump water on her head to wash her hair. Really great buy for bath time - better than rubber toys that fill with water and mold.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Darby

customer_reviews.title: Simple toys, great product
customer_reviews.text: Kids enjoyed, nice colors, well made. Stacking was a bit tricky for the kiddos, would be nice if they could be stacked either way instead of just the one way. Or if there were numbers on them to indicate the order. Other then that, they were a big in the bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun water toys but stacking in order is a pain ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun water toys but stacking in order is a pain for an adult, let alone a toddler. We use them outdoors in a water table which is fun but the sun lightened then quite a bit (not a problem functionally).
customer_reviews.author: E. D.

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes them
customer_reviews.text: And there is nowhere for mold to grow. Win and win.
customer_reviews.author: hudsonflyer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, colorful
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful, they float well, but the kids are boarded with them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wolanzyk

customer_reviews.title: Good Classic Toy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Won't collect mildew. They float, they pour, they have little rain shower holes...kids like em.
customer_reviews.author: NJDMS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby bathtime
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when our daughter was about 12 months and she's now 15 months and lots them. No holes for water to get stuck in (no mold) and she loves playing with them as boats or as little cups.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves these boats!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these boats. I like how they feel, the colors, and that each boat has different sized holes for pouring out the water. The fact that they stack is nice, too. Non-toxic is a bonus, as well.
customer_reviews.author: amarkofmyown

customer_reviews.title: cute but kids don't really play with them
customer_reviews.text: more of a tiny baby toy, my 20 month old and 3 yr old aren't very interested
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Best mold free bath toy we have
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these!! He stacks them together, arrange them to float near him, and lift them upside down to make it look like rain. It is supper useful for us in bath time too! We use them to wash the soap of him. They dry up easily and survived being dropped multiple times. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ekhazan

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for tub.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 2 year old LOVE this bath toy. They are both obsessed with boats and they work great in the tub. My 2YO loves stacking them and making the water splash out when she pushes down to stack them.
customer_reviews.author: DenaliBear

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old daughter LOVES these! She plays with them all the time, whether she is in the bath or not. They are actually her favorite toy, which surprised me. We keep two in the bathroom for baths and the rest scattered in rooms throughout the house so that she has one within easy reach. Great teething toy too :-)
customer_reviews.author: ADI

customer_reviews.title: Love Boon Products
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves these during her bath. I ended up buying them for my nephew due soon.
customer_reviews.author: judithbeast

customer_reviews.title: Good Bath Toys
customer_reviews.text: It floats well, is easy to clean if it gets to scummy, has different colors, size of holes are different on top. My 2 and 3 year olds love them and love to put toys on top of them to have them float about!. I like the fact there isn't semi-closed compartments where mold/mildew loves to grow in!
customer_reviews.author: J. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, colorful, interesting, fun.
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are so simple and easy to clean. They're good for learning colors and interesting because they are all slightly different sizes and must be stacked in a specific order. At first that kind of just annoyed me but I guess it's a good learning opportunity for the little one to identify small variances and order them accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great for bath play. Love that they are stackable! My son has a lot of fun with them in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Simple Water Toys
customer_reviews.text: Cute little water toys. We use them both in the bath and with my son’s water table. I love that you can use them as boats as well as stacking cups. Easy to clean and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My daughter loves them and plays with them in and out of the water!
customer_reviews.author: merlegirl86

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep clean, fun to play with!
customer_reviews.text: Colorful, easy to clean, fun bath toys! Nothing to catch mold in. Perfect for little hands to pour and play with.
customer_reviews.author: Annaqmama

customer_reviews.title: Looove these!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic feels so nice. Colors are great. Both my littles love them
customer_reviews.author: Jfontaine

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: These boats were even better than I thought! They are heavy duty and that means a lot to a house full of kids! They float or sink depending what you want and also strain water. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kasondra Ham

customer_reviews.title: Retire the rubber ducky
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bath toy because it's Solid plastic. No areas for water to hide and turn into mold later
customer_reviews.author: Anil

customer_reviews.title: and these were BY FAR the best of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three different sets of boats at once, and these were BY FAR the best of the bunch. Space saving stackables, incredibly sturdy, and they do not hold water. Nice, bright colors. They were a great addition for bath time as well as outdoor water table play. Really nicely designed, and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: sQueakin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My baby love this stacking boats every bubble bath. Easy to clean & air dry!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great bath toys that don’t get moldy. Super easy to clean. It’s a great stacking toy With vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Alison P

customer_reviews.title: grandkids love the. I love them
customer_reviews.text: grandkids love the. I love them. ...easy to pick up and store and do not hold bath water to go moldy like many ducky type toys
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mccracken

customer_reviews.title: like my stacking cup set
customer_reviews.text: I wish the part that dispensed water out of the holes was bigger, ie held more water, like my stacking cup set. This water show only lasts a few seconds and baby isnt all that impressed
customer_reviews.author: haley cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great boats for bath time
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kids and they love it. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Fujirio

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter's bath time to use to dump water on her head like we do in swim classes. She loves to play with them and loves to try to "catch" the water that comes out the holes on the top. All in all, a really good bath toy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Grish

customer_reviews.title: Still hunting for the perfect bath toy that won’t collect mold
customer_reviews.text: Returned these. They sink almost immediately and the “rain” feature is over before it starts. Still hunting for the perfect bath toy that won’t collect mold.
customer_reviews.author: Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent alternative to mold free bath toys! We hated having to buy new bath toys every few months and these are just perfect! No mold and a lot of fun. The little one loves these.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves to play with these in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: LISA GOODWIN

customer_reviews.title: Clean, compact, useful, and the baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: I used this as my daughter's first bath toy, and she's stayed interested for months. They're hard plastic, easy to keep mold-free, & they stack for easy storage. You can also use them to pour or sprinkle water on the baby's head, which made washing her hair easier. Great find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the Boon products so when I found these bath boats on Amazon I knew that I had to give them a try. They are so cute and my child loves playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: teach326

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My child liked it for 1 day...but that’s how it goes for most toys.
customer_reviews.author: PRTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I love Boones stuff. Most of it cute and we'll made and these boats are no exception. My 18 month old son loves to play with these in the bath. Stacking and unstacking, floating and sinking. Great addition to the growing bath toy collection.
customer_reviews.author: K. Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old loves these in the bath and at the local YMCA pool. She is able to grab the boat easily while swimming. Dries quickly- no mold!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Good, Sturdy Boats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my almost 2 year old for Easter and she loves them! I leave them in the tub upside down to dry to avoid mildew and it has seemed to work well. They're a heavy duty plastic which is really nice and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little boats
customer_reviews.text: They stack nicely to save space, and they are easy to clean, but they sink too easily for a toddler playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: K+C

customer_reviews.title: I hate that they have to be stacked in a certain ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate that they have to be stacked in a certain order. Other than that, it's a decent toy for the tub and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: NLMDallas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath toy any age
customer_reviews.text: They're like stacking cups but they float. The colors and bright and look cool when floating in a flotilla on the water. I use them to also pour/rinse soap off baby. Flip them upside down for different rain effects. Figure out how they fit together. Many ways to use this
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Love that this is a toy that doesnt suck up ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is a toy that doesnt suck up water like a lot of bath toys. Easy to clean and completely dries between uses.. LO enjoys them in the tub and we've taken them to the pool and beach as well.
customer_reviews.author: KCreativeMom

customer_reviews.title: Cool noats
customer_reviews.text: The kids live them and they are actually very simple...
customer_reviews.author: Deb Shee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath toy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean - I’ve even put them on the top shelf of my dishwasher multiple times. The kids love them and they hardly take up any space stacked together. My kids all love them from 1-5 yrs old in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Zach H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bath Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great bath toys! Easy to clean and my son loves to play with these boats at bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R. Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Love the Boon bath toys
customer_reviews.text: They float! Love the company's chemical free focus. Wanted bath toys without BPA (or mold) that would be fun. These fit the bill. My husband uses these boats to scoop water to rinse our daughter's hair. Liked them so much I bought the water bugs from Boon too. Love those as well. They float too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gipson

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they stack and are easy to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they stack and are easy to keep clean- no tiny crevasses. I didn’t rate it 5 because I wish they “rained” better
customer_reviews.author: FamilyOf3

customer_reviews.title: These are great in and out of the bath
customer_reviews.text: These are great in and out of the bath. They do sink easily, but they also lend themselves to rinsing shampoo out of hair, learning to stack, AND they take up very little real estate in the bath, which is appreciated. I think we will get a couple years enjoyment out of this cute purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina B.

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Bath Toys!
customer_reviews.text: We love these boats!! We play with them during bath time and also use them for rinsing hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Layne Fields

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Bought with several other boon products bc they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Bought with several other boon products bc they are made to not hold water. My 4 yo uses the other things more. He find the boats a little boring. But the design of them is great! Happy mom here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ...worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Great bath toy ...just need to rinse well ...get slimy if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Vermilyer

customer_reviews.title: Love that these boats have colander like holes on top ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that these boats have colander like holes on top so that they can be used to strain water, while still floating. My toddler and infant both love stacking them.
customer_reviews.author: KE

product_meta.title: Boon Stacking Boats Bathing Toys (Pack of 5)
product_meta.description: Color:MulticolorSatisfy every child’s insatiable desire to pour water on everything during bathtime with Fleet stackable boats. The wide deck with drain holes allows baby to scoop up bath toys and pour water with a fun rain effect. Bring out creativity by helping your kid create a stormy scene on the high seas with this plastic bathing toy. Rinse thoroughly before initial use and periodically and let air dry completely.
feature_bullets: BABY BATH TOYS: Plastic stacking boats designed with wide decks for scooping and pouring water
INTERACTIVE PLAY: Drain holes for fun rain effect in the baby bathtub
EASY TO CLEAN: 5 brightly colored stackable toy boats that can be handwashed and air dried
Made without BPA, Phthalate and PVC
SUITABLE FOR: Ages 9 months and up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars955 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
